1.SceneDescription:
Rachel’s bedroom; Rachel is awoken by a man singing in the next
apartment.

lines.Line:
(singing, duh) Morning’s here! Sunshine is here! The sky
is clear, the morning’s here! The morning’s here
HEY!! Do you have to do that? It’s Saturday

Oh come on! Morning’s here! (Starts singing)
Morning’s here! The morning is here! Sunshine is here

lines.Character:
(Rachel slams shut her window and storms into the living room, where Joey and Monica
are eating breakfast
lines.Line:
Rachel slams shut her window and storms into the living room, where Joey and Monica
are eating breakfast.

I hate this apartment! I hate the color of these walls! I hate
the fact that this place still smells like bird! I hate that singing guy

Are you kidding? I love that guy! (Starts singing) Morning’s here!
Morning is here

Are you kidding? I love that guy! (Starts singing) Morning’s here!
Morning is here
Stop it! I will kill you. I hate the fact that my room is so small
Hey, I have all the space I need. Just do what I did
Hey, I have all the space I need. Just do what I did

Monica, you don’t even have a bed, you sleep in a ball on the
floor

Y’know what? I am really tired of your bellyaching! Okay,
I-I worked really hard at making this a nice place for us to live
See, this is a great apartment
Shut up! This place is a hole
Shut up! This place is a hole

2.SceneDescription:
Monica and Rachel's erm, Chandler and Joey's, Joey and Chandler are watching
one of those Kung Fu movies and imitating the moves.

lines.Line:
Oh, yeah! You like ‘em? I just, I went to a used clothes store and
got a bunch of maternity stuff. These are sooo comfortable
Uhh, Pheebs, those are uh, those are Santa pants

Santa pants. (Phoebe still doesn’t get it.) Santa Claus’s
pants

Nuh-uh! They’re maternity pants. They even came with a list of baby
names. (Pulls out a sheet of paper which lists who’s been naughty and who’s been
nice.) See, these names are good, and these names are bad. (Finally, she figures it out.)
Ohh
So—Hey, Pheebs! So, how are the elves

I don’t know! How are the-the-the-the, y’know—You’re
clothes aren’t funny
Hey, guys, what-what should I wear to a Knicks game
Hey, guys, what-what should I wear to a Knicks game
Uhh, a T-shirt that says, "I don’t belong here.

Yeah, my mom got my dad’s season tickets in the divorce, so she
just gave them to me
Yeah, apparently, they’re pretty good seats
Yeah, apparently, they’re pretty good seats
(examining the tickets) Oh my God! Those are almost right on the floor
Just give us our apartment back
Boy! I didn’t see that coming
Boy! I didn’t see that coming
Oh, come on! We know what these are worth
Yeah, what, do you think we’re stupid
Yeah, what, do you think we’re stupid
You’re not stupid. You’re meaner than I thought

Forget it! Okay, I’m not giving up my bachelor pad for some
basketball seats
Have you even had a girl up here
No. But uh, Joey has, and I usually talk to them in the morning time

3.SceneDescription:
Monica and Rachel's erm, Chandler and Joey's, later that same day. Joey and
Chandler are eating pizza, and Phoebe is trying to knit something.

lines.Line: (entering with Rachel) All right boys, last chance for the tickets
Or I’ll give them to my new boyfriend, Joshua

Wait-wait-wait-wait! (To Chandler) Come on! Come on, let’s trade! The
timing’s perfect, I just clogged the toilet!
Look, I want those basketball seats as much as you do! Okay, but we can’t leave in the small apartment after we’ve lived here! Didn’t you ever read Flowers for Algernon
Yes! Didn’t you ever read Sports Illustrated?! No! I didn’t read yours! But come on, we can go to the game tonight

Look, the only way I will even consider this is if they offer a lot
more than just season seats

I didn’t mean that. I just meant that the apartment is worth so
much more
Hey, so? Are you gonna do it

No. No. We’re not gonna do that, y’know why? Because its not
an even trade

All right, okay, look, what if you could keep the apartment and get the
tickets
I’m talking about a bet, winner takes all
Ooh, we could end up with nothing
Ooh, we could end up with nothing
Or you could end up with everything
All right, so what do you say
All right, so what do you say

Come on man, you know I’d do it for you! Because, you’re my best
friend

All right, but you can’t use that again for a whole year.
I’m in
Ooh, this is so exciting! Ooh, God, what are you going to bet

Oh, okay, well, I think we should let Phoebe decide, because she’s
the only who’s impartial, and she’s so pretty
Okay. Umm, ooh, ooh—oh, I have a game
Okay. Umm, ooh, ooh—oh, I have a game
What’s the game?! What’s the game?

Oh, well, it doesn’t have a name—oh, okay, Phoebeball! No, it
doesn’t have a name. Umm, okay, Monica, what is your favourite thing about trees

lines.Character: (They both rejoice; Chandler is totally confused

lines.Character: (He looks to Chandler, who doesn’t have a clue
lines.Line: He looks to Chandler, who doesn’t have a clue.

Ooh, three points. Both fine answers, but we were looking for leafy,
leafy

You wanna finish this right now? All right, we get a deck of cards, high

Yeah! Here! (She grabs a deck out of her purse) Oh no, these are the
trick deck. Okay. Here yes. Okay
Okay, you guys uh, you guys pick firs
Yeah! Okay. (Joey picks a card.) Phoebe, you look, I can’t
What make you think I can?! (Shields her eyes from it.
Okay. Okay. (He looks at the card.) Ace
Okay. Okay. (He looks at the card.) Ace

lines.Character: (Both Joey and Chandler and Monica and Rachel jump up and down for joy
lines.Line: Both Joey and Chandler and Monica and Rachel jump up and down for joy.
Why are you screaming and hugging
Why are you screaming and hugging
Because we won our apartment back
What? Ace is high! Jack, queen, king, ace
What? Ace is high! Jack, queen, king, ace
No! Ace is low! Ace, two, three, four

lines.Character: (They all look to Phoebe to settle this
lines.Line: They all look to Phoebe to settle this.

lines.Character: (They all look to Phoebe to settle this

I don’t know. Ooh! Ooh! Look it! (She fans out the trick deck.)
Ah-ha
All right, cut, let’s pick again, pick again

Come on apartment! Come on apartment! (Picks a card.) Oh! I know queen
is high
Uh-huh, not as high as…(picks a card) It worked! King
But, we pick again! We pick again

Tickets please! (Rachel hands over the tickets) That’s courtside
baby

Seriously, good game though. Good game. (He tries to congratulate them,
but they pull away.) (To Chandler) What are they so mad about? They get the apartment
back

4.SceneDescription: The hallway, Joey and Chandler are coming back from the game.

lines.Line: Those were like the best seats ever

Oh yeah. Hey! Should we give these shirts to the girls? Y’know, kinda
like a peace offering

Oh yeah, that’s very nice. Plus, y’know they were free and
they’re too small

lines.Character: (He knocks on the girls’ door and walks in. Surprise! The girls, obviously using Star Trek technology, have completely moved everything in both apartments back to their original positions, all in the time it took for the guys to go to a basketball game. Wow! Anyhoo, Chandler is stunned, and Joey doesn’t even realise it
lines.Line: He knocks on the girls’ door and walks in. Surprise! The girls, obviously using Star Trek technology, have completely moved everything in both apartments back to their original positions, all in the time it took for the guys to go to a basketball game. Wow! Anyhoo, Chandler is stunned, and Joey doesn’t even realise it.

Oh. Oh, God! (He starts running around like a chicken with his head
cut off.

Hey, want a beer? (Hands him a beer and sits down in one of the chairs.)
(Jumping up.) WHOA!!!

lines.Character: (They both sprint to what used to be their apartment
lines.Line: They both sprint to what used to be their apartment.
Open up! Open up! Open up
Open up! Open up! Open up

lines.Character: (A very angry Monica opens the door with the security chain still on
lines.Line: A very angry Monica opens the door with the security chain still on.
We’ll discuss it, in the morning! (Slams the door shut.
What the hell is going on?
What the hell is going on?

lines.Character: (It’s Rachel’s turn to open the door
lines.Line: It’s Rachel’s turn to open the door.

lines.Character: (It’s Rachel’s turn to open the door
lines.Line: It’s Rachel’s turn to open the door.
We took our apartment back!! (Slams the door shut.

(opening the door) I had nothing to do with it. (Closes the door.)
(Opens the door.) Okay, it was my idea, but I don’t feel good about it

lines.Character: (She goes to close the door, but Chandler puts his foot it in
lines.Line: She goes to close the door, but Chandler puts his foot it in.
We are switching back, right now
We are switching back, right now
No, we’re not! We’re not leaving

Well, you’re gonna have to leave sometime, because you both have
jobs, and as soon as you do, we’re switching it back! There’s nothing you can do
to stop us! Right, Joe
I don’t want to move again!

I don’t care, this is our apartment! And they stole—you
stole it—our apartment, and we won that apartment fair and square, twice! And I am
getting it back right now. I’m getting back right now

All right. We figured you might respond this way, so we have a backup
offer
Oh no-no-no, no more offers. You can’t offer anything to us
Let us keep the apartment and
Let us keep the apartment and
As a thank you, Rachel and I will kiss for one minute

lines.Line: Time lapse. The guys are entering their apartment.

close both sections of his door
lines.Line:

Yeah! Can you believe that something that stupid actually got us our

That’s so funny to think if you’d just done that right after
the last contest, no one would have had to move at all
Yeah, let-let-let’s pretend that’s not true
Yeah, let-let-let’s pretend that’s not true

Okay, scarf’s done. (It’s not really a scarf, it’s just a

Come on! Come on. Come on
Come on! Come on. Come on
Ross has some big thing to tell everyone
Uhh, okay, it’s uh, Emily and I, we decided to uh, to get married
What? Oh, are you pregnant too?
When, when did—how, how did you
We, we just decided to uh, to go for it

I mean, we know it’s a bit hasty but, uh, it just feels so right,
so

lines.Character: (Rachel slowly walks in from her bedroom. She is stunned speechless
lines.Line: Rachel slowly walks in from her bedroom. She is stunned speechless.

lines.Character: (Rachel slowly walks in from her bedroom. She is stunned speechless
lines.Line: Rachel slowly walks in from her bedroom. She is stunned speechless.
(turning around.) Umm, uh, I was just telling the guys

Yeah, I-I heard. (Pause, everyone looks at each other, waiting for

you

lines.Character:
(Seeing Rachel’s apparently okay with this, the rest of the gang jumps up to
congratulate Ross and Emily on their pending nuptials.
lines.Line:
